message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a price of $15,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price point. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, the $15,000 price reflects the true worth of this product. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still only able to consider $10,000 for the product. Could we possibly find common ground at this price?
